title: Between the Teeth
description: In the final installment of the Between the Teeth trilogy, David has the fresh start he’s always wanted. He’s on a better team, one that doesn’t depend on him for their wins and blame him for their losses. In a better room, with teammates David might even consider friends. It doesn’t make any sense for David to feel more out of his depth than ever. But then, so many things don’t make sense to David — why should this be the exception?
author: Taylor Fitzpatrick
